traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the orc can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the orc is wearing no armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.
